channel.title: Read help please about admin trade
channel.description: hey guys, urm i cannot get it that my admins cant drop or trade, how can i do this? im using a pi base

item.title: Read help please about admin trade
item.dc:creator: @isai isai
item.description:
@isai wrote:

go to config.java and search for

public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true; //can admins trade?
public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = true; // can admins sell items?
public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = true; // can admin drop items?

change false for true!

Read full topic
item.source: Read help please about admin trade
